description: A wealthy girl and a classmate and friend of Mamoru and Yuuna. She discourages any relationship between Yuuna and Mamoru, because childhood friends who become lovers are generally unsuccessful. However, she also has feelings for Kagemori. She conceals her feelings by always beating up Mamoru but occasionally gives hints that she likes him but unfortunately Mamoru doesn`t understand it.
name: Sawagashi Airi
